definition[0]: used when you want someone to repeat something because you did not hear it
definition[1]: used to say ‘sorry’ after you have made an impolite sound such as a burp
definition[2]: to officially allow someone who has been found guilty of a crime to go free without being punished
example[1]: The two spies were pardoned yesterday by the president.
definition[3]: to forgive someone for behaving badly
example[2]: He could never pardon her for the things she had said.
definition[4]: an official order allowing someone who has been found guilty of a crime to go free without being punished
example[3]: Tyler was convicted but was granted a royal pardon  (=one given by a king or queen).
